name: Morana
description:
Game Concept

This game was made for the Jame Gam 23

The player takes on the role as a ghost of a young girl named Morana who had passed away due to sickness. The player ventures throughout a haunted mansion collecting keys and power-up items in the form of delicious candy. The player uses a combination of melee attacks and the power-up items in order to end the suffering of spirits who have not yet crossed over. The levels are radonmized making it different each time.

Controls

Arrows for Movement

Space to Jump

F to Fire Lolipops

A to Attack

Credits

Dmendz:

Programming and Level Design

Shana001_Meena:

Character Design, Character Animations, Game Assets, UI Design, Title Screen, Level Design

Music

Spooky Village 8-bit
